flags.description: Shift set time card constraint IDs (comma-separated or repeated)
flags.name: --shift-set-time-card-constraint-ids

flags.description: Service type unit of measure ID
flags.name: --service-type-unit-of-measure

flags.description: Time card IDs to allocate across (comma-separated or repeated)
flags.name: --time-card-ids
--allocation-quantities
flags.validation: Must be valid JSON array; each entry should include time_card_id and quantity; percentages must sum to 100% when provided. Example: [{"time_card_id":"123","quantity":1.25}].

side_effects: Creates a driver day shortfall allocation and distributes the shortfall across time cards; ensures related tenders have rates for the service type unit of measure.
validation_notes: --service-type-unit-of-measure, --quantity, and --shift-set-time-card-constraint-ids are required. --time-card-ids is required unless --allocation-quantities supplies time_card_id values. --allocation-quantities must be valid JSON array; each entry should include time_card_id and quantity; percentages must sum to 100% when provided; entries must include a non-empty time_card_id.
